name: Square colours
description:
A short puzzlescript game about changing the colour of walls from neutral to red, blue or purple.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=521e663959f62293515f73533041f44f

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=521e663959f62293515f73533041f44f

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
